711582f-a.text:
320 West 21 Street, south side between 8th and 9th Avenues, showing P.S. 11.

Board of Education, N.Y.C.
CREDIT LINE IMPERATIVE.   1920.

Neg: 3094

710112f-a.text:
Eighth Avenue, west side, at 21st Street. The clearing is for the erection of a six-story apartment house.
March 12, 1929.

P. L. Sperr.

711584f-a.text:
W. 21st Street, north side, west from Eighth, to Ninth Avenues, showing the demolition of two buildings, No's 313 and 315. These will be replaced by a modern 6 story apartment house, according to the New York Times of April 4. 1938.

June 14, 1938.

P.L. Sperr

711583f-a.text:
21st Street, 8th to 9th Avenue. (Before Reconstruction).

President Borough of Manhattan.

710111f-a.text:
Eighth Avenue at S.W. corner of 21st Street.
January 22, 1929.
P.L. Sperr, Photographer.
